bookPages:
A Guide to /Stats

/stats is one of the most useful things to people who plan to be, or are, magic users.
.
The first thing it displays is your base level, which is gained from killing mobs through all types of magic use. A base level requirment can be

seen in all racial specific abilities. These abilities can be particularly useful, such as Take Flight, the name of this ability explains itself.
.
The following levels below these are fields of magic abilities, each with there own specific style.

In these it shows you your level and the experience accumulated and the experience required, just like Base.
.
Below these are Hitpoints which display, in numbers, your health. Next to it is hitpoint shielding, which can be affected by

Combat and Ranged magic, because of their buff abilities.
.
Underneath all the rest is your power, which, shows how much power is left (out of a hundred, so for example if it displays 25, it means you have 25/100 power) before you cannot peform
